newsitem.title: USA: House of Fabrics names Richey CEO.
newsitem.headline: House of Fabrics names Richey CEO.

text.p: House of Fabrics Inc said it named Donald Richey as president, chief executive officer and a member of the board.
Richey, 53, succeeds Gary Larkins, 54, who was named to the newly created post of vice chairman last December.

Most recently, Richey was executive vice president and chief operating officer of Fabri-Centers of America Inc, a Hudson, Ohio-based specialty retailer with approximately 950 stores and $800 million in annual revenue.
